text: Street Fighter is an American 1994 action movie written and directed by Steven E. de Souza, it is based on the video game series of the same name published by Capcom. Distributed by Universal Pictures in the United States and internationally by Columbia Pictures. == Main cast == * Jean-Claude Van Damme as Colonel Guile * Byron Mann as Ryu * Ming-Na Wen as Chun-Li * Damian Chapa as Ken * Raul Julia as M. Bison * Gregg Rainwater as T. Hawk * Kylie Minogue as Cammy * Ninuel A. Núñez as Dee Jay Category:1994 action movies Category:American action movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Street Fighter
title: Street Fighter (1994 movie)
